name: collection-builder-cdm-skin-data
title: Collection Builder CDM Skin Data
description: Metadata and data derived from Collection Builder CDM Skin. CollectionBuilder-CONTENTdm is a template for creating digital collection exhibits on top of existing CONTENTdm repositories. This demo features materials from the Frank B. Robinson Papers documenting Psychiana, a religion popular in the 1930s and 40s.

contributors.title: Digital Initiatives, University of Idaho Library
